entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
